GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an object of the article with the input id

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:articles_id/comments.description: serves an array of all comments assigned to the input article_id

POST /api/articles/:articles_id/comments.description: serves a new object containing a new comment when the username and body are given in the request body.

comments.body: Great read, but i do have a few points...
comments.author: butter_bridge

PATCH /api/articles/:articles_id.description: serves an object of the article with the input id with an updated vote count

articles.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
articles.author: butter_bridge

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes a comment by a given comment_id and responds with status 204 and no content
